column4: Do I need a firewall on Ubuntu? I assumed there was one set up automatically but when I type ufw status it says its inactive
There are no ports listening by default, so no firewall rules by default.
so I don't need a firewall? I installed firestarter - do I need it?

iptables is already installed, its part of your kernel.  Unless you are installing things that open ports and you don't want certain addresses to get to them, then you don't need to configure any rules with firestarter/ufw.
